mapper.select: /* kr.letech.demo.cmn.cmnt.dao.CmntDAO.selectBoardCmntList */ SELECT B.CMNT_SEQ AS cmntSeq , B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo , B.CMNT_CONT AS cmntCont , B.RGST_ID AS rgstId , TO_CHAR(B.RGST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-dd HH:MM:SS') AS rgstDt , TO_CHAR(B.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-dd HH:MM:SS') AS updtDt FROM TB_BOARD A INNER JOIN TB_CMNT B ON(A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND A.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
